title: Electromagnetic Fabric Debugging Design Activity: Constructivist Error Resolution Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic electronic circuit concepts and experience in utilizing textile materials
context.additional_context: Combining smartphone-based tools with offline collaborative activities, emphasizing practical problem-solving tailored to professional learners' characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can promote peer debugging activities by intentionally designing defects in electronic textile circuits.
Learners can diagnose causes of system errors in defective textile works produced by peers with 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more creative problem-solving strategies during error-resolution processes using a constructivist approach.

resources: Digital Portfolio Template for Error Documentation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
